key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny and legal challenges, including allegations of unauthorized practice of law
Sluggish revenue growth and reliance on the U.S. market
Customer service issues and low complaint resolution rates
controversies: Ongoing investigations by state bar associations and regulators
Criticism over customer service quality and subscription cancellation difficulties
Concerns about data privacy practices and compliance with privacy laws
social_issues: Ethical scrutiny over the hybrid model of offering legal tools while partnering with licensed attorneys
Customer dissatisfaction with registered agent services and core offerings
governance_issues: Regulatory risks impacting business model and expansion
Execution risks associated with the transition to a subscription-based revenue model
